bibl.title: The Epistolary Rhetoric of Zoilos of Aspendos and the Early Cult of Sarapis: Re-reading P. Cair. Zen. I 59034.
bibl.note: Section I: Text and Translation of Zoilos's Letter. - Section II: Redefining Religious Agency and Sacral Finance. - Section III: The Zoilos Papyrus and the Cult of Sarapis at Memphis and Saqqâra. - P. 198: Appendix: Locations and activities of Zoilos, Apollonios and Zenon during the period preceding receipt of P. Cair. Zen. I, 59034.
bibl.seg: RENBERG Gil H. and William S. BUBELIS, The Epistolary Rhetoric of Zoilos of Aspendos and the Early Cult of Sarapis: Re-reading P. Cair. Zen. I 59034.

Section I: Text and Translation of Zoilos's Letter. - Section II: Redefining Religious Agency and Sacral Finance. - Section III: The Zoilos Papyrus and the Cult of Sarapis at Memphis and Saqqâra. - P. 198: Appendix: Locations and activities of Zoilos, Apollonios and Zenon during the period preceding receipt of P. Cair. Zen. I, 59034.
